T02D3621:242a-1: ha ya gr'i ba s'a dha nam /
T02D3621:242a-4: dpal rta mgrin la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3621:242a-5: sngon du gsungs pa'i cho gas sna tshogs chu skyes
T02D3621:242a-6: dang nyi ma la ham yig dmar po'i ye shes
T02D3621:242a-7: rdzogs pa las rta mgrin sku mdog dmar po zhal
T02D3621:242a-9: zhal so so ba la spyan gsum pa sngon po
T02D3621:242a-10: dang dkar po ni g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal lo
T02D3621:242a-11: // sbrul gyis brgyan pa zhabs rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs shing /
T02D3621:242a-12: khro bo'i lta stangs kyis gzigs pa /
T02D3621:242a-13: zhal dang po bzhad pa zhal g-yas pas ljags bsgril ba /
T02D3621:242a-14: zhal g-yon pa'i mche ba dag gis ma mchu bsdams pa'o //
T02D3621:242a-15: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can no //
T02D3621:242a-16: rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D3621:242a-17: mda' 'phyar ba ni g-yas kyi phyag bzhi na'o //
T02D3621:242a-18: sdigs mdzub dang rang gi nu ma bzung ba dang /
T02D3621:242b-0: @242b gzhu 'phyar ba ni g-yon gyi phyag bzhi na'o //
T02D3621:242b-1: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan par bsam par bya'o zhes
T02D3621:242b-2: pa ni rta mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes
T02D3621:242b-5: aom ham ha ya gr'i ba sv'a h'a /
